name: Our Only Hope (V)
Lore: '''The Emperor knew, as I did, if Anakin were to have any offspring, they would be a threat to him.''',
Text: 'If your [Death Star II] objective on table,USED: Deploy Luke from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR During your move phase, relocate Luke to a site opponent occupies.LOST: If your Rebel of ability > 2 just won a battle or duel, take any one card into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle (if Rebel is Luke, may also retrieve any one card).',
